name: Escape from the Collector
storyline: After a stressful day at home, you get ready for bed, but when you wake up the next morning, you find yourself in an unfamiliar room, not recognizing your surroundings at all. "Escape from the Collector" presents an experience that combines the emotion of an escape room with the intensity of an adventure shrouded in darkness. Immerse yourself in an intriguing atmosphere where you will find yourself trapped in an old house with different levels, each filled with challenging puzzles and hidden clues. Will you have the cunning to unravel the mysteries of this house and escape the Collector's sinister game?
summary: In "Escape from the Collector", you will be trapped in an old house full of puzzles and secrets. Explore its rooms searching clues that will guide your adventure. Each puzzle solved brings you closer to freedom or dooms you to be trapped in the Collector's sinister game. Will you be able to escape?
